original_title: Principal arrested for sexually assaulting schoolgirl
original_body_lines: A principal of a school in Pinnawala, Balangoda has been arrested on charges of sexually assaulting a schoolgirl, police said.
Initial investigations revealed that the suspect had sexually assaulted an 11-year-old girl living near the suspect's house.
The  50-year-old principal, a resident of Balangoda will be produced before the Balangoda Magistrate's Court today.
